issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: It seems like very few paths use READ_ALL_COLUMNS config, but some do. LLAP IO doesn't account for that.
fields.summary: LLAP IO may NPE on all-column read

comments.body:
Added a  test too, however on MiniLlap/Local it doesn't repro the issue that we've seen on some cluster where analyze table ... for columns resulted in null columnIds.

[~prasanth_j] can you take a look?

[~mmccline] FYI I think some schema evolution paths may also assume non-null column list... e.g. buildConversionFileTypesArray seems to assume in isOk path that readerIncludes are not null even though they could be.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12847940/HIVE-15649.patch

{color:green}SUCCESS:{color} +1 due to 1 test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 372 failed/errored test(s), 10821 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}
TestDerbyConnector - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file (likely timed out) (batchId=234)
